title: Luxury Suite with Ocean View
description: Indulge in luxury with breathtaking ocean views in our spacious suite. Perfect for couples or solo travelers seeking a lavish retreat.
offer: 25% off for bookings made before June 1st

title: Deluxe Double Room
description: Experience ultimate comfort in our Deluxe Double Room. Ideal for couples or business travelers seeking a stylish and relaxing space.

title: Standard Single Room
description: Our cozy Standard Single Room offers all the essentials for a comfortable stay. Perfect for solo travelers on a budget.

title: Family Suite
description: Spacious and family-friendly, our Family Suite provides ample space for a comfortable stay. Enjoy quality time together with all the necessary amenities.
offer: 10% off for stays of 5 nights or more

title: Executive Suite
description: Experience luxury and sophistication in our Executive Suite. Perfect for business travelers or those seeking an elevated stay experience.

title: Standard Double Room
description: Enjoy a comfortable stay in our Standard Double Room. Perfect for couples or friends traveling together.
offer: Free upgrade to Deluxe Double Room upon availability
